title: Step-by-step instructions
pageDescription: How to add a card, how to return money from a VK Cloud account, how to generate a report document, how to view a report on write-offs in the project.
shortDescription: Operations on balance sheet management, formation of accounting documents, refund of funds
metaDescription: VK Cloud: basic billing management operations available to individuals and legal entities
markdown: The main billing management operations available to individuals and legal entities through the VK Cloud personal account. Formation of accounting documents for legal entities.
